Name: A Stranger in a Strange Land
QuestDesc: In this battle that sealed the fate of Rinascita, its people rose in defiance. And among them stood another, a swordsman of Huanglong, guided across the seas by Huanglong Mingting to lend you his strength. He fought as one among the countless souls drawn to this hour, but the story of his own journey, and the shadows of his past, remain known to few…

Chapters.Title: Return to Ragunna City

Dialogues.Speaker: Ciaccona
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Welcome back. Shall we continue the story?

Dialogues.Speaker: Ciaccona
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Welcome back. Shall we continue the story?

Dialogues.Speaker: Ciaccona
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Welcome back. Shall we continue the story?

Dialogues.Speaker: Ciaccona
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Welcome back. Shall we continue the story?

Chapters.Title: Head to Ragunna City Square and find Ciaccona

Dialogues.Speaker: Ciaccona
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: 'Twas a battle fierce and dire. The Laureate fell, consumed by mire.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ciaccona
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Into the Dark Tide {Male=he's;Female=she's} gone, vanished. Our minds shattered, hope now banished

Dialogues.Speaker: Ciaccona
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: O' woeful hearts! O' helpless hands! Was this the end of all our plans?

Dialogues.Speaker: Ciaccona
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Then soared the dark slayer, wings aflame. Striking down foes, breaking the chain.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ciaccona
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Our Laureate rose in radiant swell, outshining the Threnodian's spell.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ciaccona
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Though shadows vast did crowd the night, the light of unity shone ever bright.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ciaccona
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: With lantern held high, {Male=he;Female=she} banished the Dark Tide. Rinascita's long night, hereby cast aside!

Dialogues.Speaker: Ciaccona
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And while the dark hero has sadly gone, our Laureate is here for us to cheer on!

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ahem...

Dialogues.Speaker: Ciaccona
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, it was such an epic fight. If I can spin it into a song, maybe it'll live on in the hearts of Ragunna and Septimont, and all of Rinascita.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ciaccona
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Through this song, the land will rise anew, and the names of all the fallen will never fade…

Options.PlotLineKey: So this is what a bard does...
Oh, I really am quite the legend.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ciaccona
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Heh, but there's another player in this tale...

Dialogues.Speaker: Ciaccona
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: He was neither Ragunnesi nor Septimontian. Have you heard the story of this outlander?

Dialogues.Speaker: Ciaccona
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No? Then listen close. My melody will bring the story to life before your eyes...

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: With the Dark Tide quelled and Leviathan defeated, a new dawn rises over Rinascita. At Margherita's, Ciaccona now sings a song about that battle. Woven into that song is a tale of a mysterious man from Huanglong. As you listen, his story unfolds before your eyes...

Dialogues.Speaker: Leon
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Um... hello? Sir?

Dialogues.Speaker: Leon
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Are you... a neighbor in need?

Dialogues.Speaker: Leon
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: By the Sentinel, the Order of the Deep will assist you with all that we have.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I need to see Fenrico.

Dialogues.Speaker: Leon
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You wish to confess to our Primus? Alas, Lord Fenrico is currently away on a journey to spread the Sentinel's teachings.

Dialogues.Speaker: Leon
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But if you need assistance, simply let someone know you seek the Order's aid. They'll take you to the Cathedral of Mercury.

Dialogues.Speaker: Leon
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You can always find me in the Cathedral, brother. My name is Leon.

Dialogues.Speaker: Leon
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: May Imperator be with you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Confess... to a Primus colluding with a Threnodian?

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But if he's not here, then I'll seek out the "Blessed Maiden"... or {PlayerName}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ciaccona
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hello there! You are...

Dialogues.Speaker: Ciaccona
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: From Huanglong, right? I assume from the style of your clothing. Are you travelling? Rinascita does offer some marvelous views...

Dialogues.Speaker: Resident of Ragunna
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ah!!!

Dialogues.Speaker: Fleeing Civilian
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: M-monsters!

Dialogues.Speaker: Fleeing Civilian
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Watch out for the black mud!

Dialogues.Speaker: Leon
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: La Guardia, protect the people! Citizens, to the Cathedral!

Dialogues.Speaker: Leon
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Children and seniors first! Quickly!

Dialogues.Speaker: Leon
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Fear not, the Order will shelter everyone!

Dialogues.Speaker: Ciaccona
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Just as {PlayerName} once described...

Dialogues.Speaker: Ciaccona
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Are these... the End Times before the Paradise descends?

Dialogues.Speaker: Ciaccona
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Everyone, get out of here!

Dialogues.Speaker: Ciaccona
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hey, friend from Huanglong! You should get to safety with the others. These monsters aren't just for show!

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Escort the civilians to safety.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll handle this.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: His name is Qiuyuan. He appeared in Ragunna City, originally in search of Fenrico, Primus of the Order of the Deep. But before long, the city was struck by the Dark Tide and its spawn. By then, you had already departed for Avinoleum to seek Cartethyia's aid concerning the Civilization Capsule...

Chapters.Title: Defeat TDs spawned from the Dark Tide

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...Hmph, the Threnodian's dregs.

Chapters.Title: Defeat TDs spawned from the Dark Tide
Go to where Acolytes are evacuating the civilians

Dialogues.Speaker: Guiding Acolyte
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Brother Leon, come aboard now!

Dialogues.Speaker: Guiding Acolyte
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Cathedral is already close to capacity!

Dialogues.Speaker: Leon
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You go! There are still many in the city who need evacuating!

Dialogues.Speaker: Leon
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Tell Phoebe she must protect everyone inside the Cathedral. No matter what!

Chapters.Title: Find Acolyte of the Order

Dialogues.Speaker: Leon
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's you...

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Get to safety.

Dialogues.Speaker: Leon
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But there are still people trapped in the square!

Dialogues.Speaker: Leon
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Carlotta Montelli.

Dialogues.Speaker: Carlotta
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sir Leon? And this is...?

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Qiuyuan.

Dialogues.Speaker: Leon
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I might not have survived if not for this kind soul from Huanglong.

Dialogues.Speaker: Carlotta
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: My deepest gratitude for your aid.

Dialogues.Speaker: Carlotta
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Tacet Discords have appeared in the city without the slightest forewarning—

Dialogues.Speaker: Leon
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ms. Carlotta, what of the Montelli Quarter? Have the civilians there been safely evacuated?

Dialogues.Speaker: Carlotta
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: They're en route to the Cathedral as we speak. You may rest easy on that front.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Threnodian's shadow already hangs over this city...

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I can actually see you through the Dark Tide?

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Could it be...?

Dialogues.Speaker: Leon
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Are you leaving, sir?

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This place is no longer safe. You must all retreat.

Dialogues.Speaker: Leon
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...May Imperator be with you, friend.

Dialogues.Speaker: Carlotta
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Quite the mysterious man to vanish in such a fashion.

Dialogues.Speaker: Leon
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I sense no ill intent. He appeared... to be searching for something.

Dialogues.Speaker: Carlotta
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: An old acquaintance of yours, Sir Leon?

Dialogues.Speaker: Leon
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Not quite. Just crossed paths earlier on Bank Street.

Dialogues.Speaker: Leon
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Leviathan's whispers hold no sway over outlanders. May Imperator's grace guide him to what he seeks and keep him steadfast on his path.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ciaccona
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Carlotta!

Dialogues.Speaker: Ciaccona
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Everyone from the square should be inside the Cathedral by now. I went door by door to make sure! The children here are the last ones left.

Dialogues.Speaker: Leon
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You... you're a Toccata...

Dialogues.Speaker: Ciaccona
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This city and her people are crying out to us. We will weather this storm together!

Dialogues.Speaker: Leon
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Divine Envoys, Ragunna hangs by a thread! Fulfill your sacred duty! Defend the city and her people!

Dialogues.Speaker: Carlotta
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Brace yourselves!

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Qiuyuan fights alone, driving back Tidespawn in the streets and rescuing an Acolyte in the middle of evacuating civilians. Carlotta and the others soon arrive to help, guiding the civilians to seek sanctuary at the Cathedral of Mercury and Averardo Vault. Because Qiuyuan is not from Rinascita, the Dark Tide does not harm him. Instead, it allows him to sense you in pursuit of Galbrena, far away in Avinoleum...

Chapters.Title: Go to the platform and investigate

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName} is here. I can sense it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But there is another strange presence in this tower.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Dark Tide follows the vessel bearing its power...

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Its corruption is already here.

Chapters.Title: Defeat TDs drawn by the Dark Tide
Put the warrior corrupted by the Dark Tide to rest
Investigate the traces of Rover's frequency

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This frequency seems to belong to the Maiden.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Just what I need.

Chapters.Title: Clear the waterway and reach the tower
Enter the tower

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This must be the work of that Maiden.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But {PlayerName} was not the only one to pass through here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: There's another... shrouded in dark flames with intent to kill.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Pathetic. To die a needless death for a hopeless cause.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You're nowhere near enough to stop me.

Chapters.Title: Take the elevator

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The sound of a firearm...

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Someone got here before me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: HRT_Rinascita_Interludes_301_3

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: HRT_Rinascita_Interludes_301_4

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: HRT_Rinascita_Interludes_301_5

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: HRT_Rinascita_Interludes_301_6

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: HRT_Rinascita_Interludes_301_7

Chapters.Title: Talk to Cantarella

Dialogues.Speaker: Cantarella
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: An agent from <te href=260009>Mingting</te>? Wait, I know you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Cantarella
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You serve under Lord Liang... Qiuyuan, if memory serves?

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...You know Grandmaster Liang?

Dialogues.Speaker: Cantarella
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I had the privilege of meeting many distinguished officials in Mingting. The <te href=260002>Ministry of Sentinel Affairs</te> once introduced me to your <te href=260001>Internal Security Agency</te>'s workings.

Dialogues.Speaker: Cantarella
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I would never confuse the man behind Lord Liang. The one without sight yet seeing all... the Blind Watcher.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I see what others cannot. That's all.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This bullet ended Cartethyia... yet I sense no malice from it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Born of light, yet flying amidst shadow.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What kind of flame... are you seeking?

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Cartethyia, Resonator of both Sentinel and Threnodian.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Even in "death," you remain the vessel of both.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As for you...

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: There's no record of you in Mingting's archives.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: All your frequencies are tied to the Threnodian.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Chaotic, ever devouring, assimilating... That is Tacet Discord. A power not fully your own.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You seek vengeance, but she is not your true target... it's the Divinity.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But you kept this from {PlayerName}. That is why it all unfolded so suddenly.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Besides spark and firewood, you needed another person to stoke the fire—

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So it is you, {PlayerName}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You match what Magistrate Jinhsi's bodyguard described. However...

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The mark of Leviathan's Dark Tide clings to you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That was why I sensed you through the Dark Tide in the city.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Anyone tainted by a Threnodian is fated for destruction.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Even if a cleansing fire could burn away that darkness, when the moment of choice comes...

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Will you turn the blade on yourself?

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That woman did shoot Cartethyia. {PlayerName} is after her now.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But that's not the whole story.

Dialogues.Speaker: Cantarella
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: How do you know that?

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I can sense lingering frequencies in a place.

Dialogues.Speaker: Cantarella
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Sentinel is no more, the Blessed Maiden is gone, and now the Dark Tide descends…

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You are outnumbered.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You said you met with Mingting's officials. That means you had an audience not just with Grandmaster Liang, but with the <te href=260008>Grand Marshal</te>, too.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: She asked me to execute a Fractsidus Overseer named Scar in Rinascita, and help {PlayerName} in the process.

Dialogues.Speaker: Cantarella
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So Mingting had foreseen all this?

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's not my concern.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "Thou shalt wield the torch of the usurper to drive away the darkness."

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's all the Ministry of Sentinel Affairs gave me. Any clue what this "torch" might be?

Dialogues.Speaker: Cantarella
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Usurper... Torch...

Dialogues.Speaker: Cantarella
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That may be referring to Primus Fenrico and the "First Relic" he holds.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Then that relic might be the help {PlayerName} needs.

Dialogues.Speaker: Cantarella
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Fenrico should still be in the experiment site he secretly built.

Dialogues.Speaker: Cantarella
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It lies beneath the waters to the southwest of Thessaleo Fells. I'm afraid you'll need to pinpoint the precise location yourself.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I see.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: One more thing. Don't tell anyone I was here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Do I have your word?

Dialogues.Speaker: Cantarella
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And why is that? Are you not a Mingting official?

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I was. Not anymore.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Mingting... is not the place you once visited.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Secure Cartethyia's body and get to a safer place.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Qiuyuan arrives in Avinoleum. By then, Cartethyia has already been killed by Galbrena, and you have left in pursuit. Only Cantarella remains. She recognizes Qiuyuan as a former high official of Mingting. He tells her someone in Mingting has sent him to aid you, and through his Mindsight ability, he perceives the Mark of the Dark Tide clinging to you...

Chapters.Title: Chase down any traces of Fenrico

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: To hide such a facility under the sea.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Such desecration. Such... absurdity.

Chapters.Title: Chase down any traces of Fenrico

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You creatures lurking in the dark...

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll show you what the real darkness looks like.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fenrico
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Away... darkness...

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Looks like Fenrico is still controlling this place.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: He should be up ahead.

Chapters.Title: Defeat TDs drawn by the Dark Tide
Reach Fenrico
Find Fenrico
Find Fenrico
Your Nemesis stands before you. Defeat the "Fractsidus Member"

Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh?

Dialogues.Speaker: Leon?
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This place is marred by the Dark Tide's filth. Why risk yourself, brother?

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's you... the Fractsidus I sensed.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Playing dress-up again... Is this your twisted idea of fun?

Dialogues.Speaker: Leon?
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: By the Sentinel, do you not recognize me?

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Your disguise means nothing to me. I recognize your frequency.

Dialogues.Speaker: Leon?
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hehe... What truly separates us, brother?

Dialogues.Speaker: Leon?
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A face alone is a sorry veneer. I am an Acolyte...

Dialogues.Speaker: Leon?
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Just as you are a fugitive clinging to an official's uniform.

Dialogues.Speaker: Leon?
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What a shame you couldn't end "him" in Mingting… and now, you still can't.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Why are you here?

Dialogues.Speaker: Leon?
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A grim stage has been set for {PlayerName} in this land.

Dialogues.Speaker: Leon?
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And I, at the invitation of another, am merely a supporting character in this grand performance.

Dialogues.Speaker: Leon?
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And my role is to stop you here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Leon?
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As an Acolyte, my faith in "Imperator" is indestructible, though my flesh remains so very fragile.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You killed that Acolyte.

Dialogues.Speaker: Leon?
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, he's quite hale and hearty. Right now, he should be tending to the wounded in that vault.

Dialogues.Speaker: Leon?
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Besides, it's beneath me to move against such an... ordinary character.

Dialogues.Speaker: Leon?
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Such brutality. And here I stand, an unarmed Acolyte.

Dialogues.Speaker: Leon?
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A pale shadow compared to Lord Liang Dongyuan, the mighty master of both pen and sword.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You will pay for murdering Grandmaster Liang with your blood.

Dialogues.Speaker: Leon?
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh really? Isn't that debt yours to answer for?

Dialogues.Speaker: Leon?
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A wanted criminal of Mingting, and yet the Ministry of War sent you all the way to Rinascita to hunt down Scar in secret.

Dialogues.Speaker: Leon?
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Who would've thought... Mingting places such importance on him.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If you know that, it means you still have eyes and ears in Mingting.

Dialogues.Speaker: Leon?
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Without a doubt. I am... "everywhere."

Dialogues.Speaker: Leon?
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Speaking of which, Scar should be in Septimont now.

Dialogues.Speaker: Leon?
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: He did a patchy job in Jinzhou and needs to answer for his own missteps. I will not interfere with how you handle him.

Dialogues.Speaker: Leon?
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As for our dear Primus here, a ruling hand clinging tightly to a cruel fate, a martyr yet to earn a name...

Dialogues.Speaker: Leon?
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You are here for him, no?

Dialogues.Speaker: Leon?
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "Thou shalt wield the torch of the usurper to drive away the darkness."

Dialogues.Speaker: Leon?
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A Huanglong prophecy, yes? But isn't it just another verse in Divinity's script?

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What have you done to him?

Dialogues.Speaker: Leon?
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Me? Nothing.

Dialogues.Speaker: Leon?
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What you see is simply the consequence of him fulfilling his destiny.

Dialogues.Speaker: Leon?
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A remnant of his consciousness still lingers, right inside that lantern.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Step aside.

Dialogues.Speaker: Leon?
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Why of course. What could an unarmed Acolyte possibly do against Huanglong's blade?

Dialogues.Speaker: Leon?
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Still, allow me a parting word...

Dialogues.Speaker: Leon?
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Fenrico... he's not so different from you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Leon?
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You have killed without hesitation, and your one mistake was a single act of mercy.

Dialogues.Speaker: Leon?
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: For that moment of weakness, you've paid no less than he did.

Dialogues.Speaker: Leon?
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: How can a lone, flickering torch hope to banish shadow upon shadow?

Dialogues.Speaker: Leon?
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ruthless soul, your end awaits you!

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Following Cantarella's clues, Qiuyuan finds Fenrico at the Fabricatorium of the Deep, only to be blocked by an illusion of an Acolyte, a Fractsidus member in disguise. Qiuyuan instantly recognizes "him" as the one who killed his Grandmaster. Yet he also knows this figure is only a projection, not the true "killer." The man declares he will not stop Qiuyuan and steps aside, saying only by letting him pass will Fenrico's destiny be fulfilled...

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This is...

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Fractsidus.

Chapters.Title: Put Fenrico the First to rest

Dialogues.Speaker: Fenrico
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Be gone... Be gone...

Dialogues.Speaker: Fenrico
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You short-lived glimmer of a candle...

Dialogues.Speaker: Fenrico
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Just as the tale of the fool...

Dialogues.Speaker: Fenrico
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Vociferous, but hollow.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Dark Tide. Seems like he's still connected with the Threnodian...

Dialogues.Speaker: Fenrico
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: My... cathedral.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fenrico
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This is...

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A corner in the realm of my mind. It shifts with the person I meet.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This cathedral shows your obsession.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fenrico
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A soul from Huanglong...

Dialogues.Speaker: Fenrico
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Here, you shall find neither the gospel you can accept, nor the judgment you are meant to endure.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Threnodian has taken everything from you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Your Blessed Maiden is dead, your city crumbles.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Dark Tide will soon swallow it whole. Your tie with the Threnodian should have shown you what's already happened.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Give me the lantern.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fenrico
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Tell me, by what right do you demand what is ours?

Dialogues.Speaker: Fenrico
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "The path born of injustice must be fortified with further transgressions…"

Dialogues.Speaker: Fenrico
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No. Our path was built upon a foundation of righteousness.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fenrico
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Here, one Primus after another offered up their battered flesh... in defiance of Leviathan.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fenrico
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And... be it Leviathan, Cartethyia, or the Fractsidus, none shall steal Ragunna from my keeping.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fenrico
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Under the hands of the Primuses, Ragunna flourished. By our light, the people were shielded from the Threnodian's corruption and led toward a true Blessed Land.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fenrico
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: People need unity of belief. That is why a Primus must rule. That is the heart of our creed.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fenrico
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It is what sustained me across twenty years of struggle against the Threnodian. I sought to bend Its power toward a higher purpose.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fenrico
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But in the end... that creed consumed me. I believed I could use Leviathan as a hammer to forge a true Blessed Land against Its hollow "Paradise." But I was the one used.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fenrico
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Such is my appointed fate. I accept it without challenge.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fenrico
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What still binds me here... is naught but fury and hatred for the betrayal.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You are only mortal. Mortals don't stand a chance against a Threnodian.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fenrico
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Night and day, Its whispers echoed in our heads. A torment no soul can endure.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fenrico
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And despite Imperator's fading light granting us only fleeting moments of clarity, generations of Primuses have willingly walked this path.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And you still thought you could control Its power?

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ambition and obsession fueled your fight against the Threnodian. But in the end, they're the very things that brought you down.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yours is a scripture of righteousness. Yet evil and atrocity are written all over your deeds.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fenrico
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I stand knee-deep in a river of blood. What is spilled cannot be unspilled.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: There was a time I could have killed a man before he waded into a river of blood.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now, that chance stands before me once more.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fenrico
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "No mortal shall inflict upon you even the slightest harm."

Dialogues.Speaker: Fenrico
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It is this prophecy and fate that lead me onward...

Dialogues.Speaker: Fenrico
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Pleasure born of violence shall end in violence.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fenrico
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You that are heavy laden by guilt, come and confess.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The First Relic draws on Qiuyuan's Mindsight to manifest the Cathedral of Mercury. There, the lingering consciousness of Fenrico confesses his ideals and intentions. To allow Qiuyuan to take the Relic and deliver it to you, Fenrico must finally accept his own death and find release. Perhaps it was fate that brought them to this moment, for Qiuyuan too is burdened by a regret over a past choice involving the Threnodian...

Dialogues.Speaker: Geshu Lin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Tell me why.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: By the order of the <te href=260011>Censorate</te>, you are to be executed by the Internal Security Agency.

Dialogues.Speaker: Geshu Lin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Me?

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: They accuse you of... colluding with Tacet Discords and wreaking havoc across Jinzhou.

Dialogues.Speaker: Geshu Lin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What a joke...

Dialogues.Speaker: Geshu Lin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Killing them isn't enough.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You killed these Tacet Discords. These people owe you their lives.

Dialogues.Speaker: Geshu Lin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes. So what?

Dialogues.Speaker: Geshu Lin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The border is in chaos, and all your Agency does is lick the boots of corrupt officials.

Dialogues.Speaker: Geshu Lin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Might as well... kill me here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Geshu Lin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Do it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Geshu Lin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If you let me live today. I swear... Every one of the ISA's dogs...

Dialogues.Speaker: Geshu Lin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And every last Tacet Discord... I'll turn these lands white with your bones.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Grandmaster Liang from the Agency spoke in your defense.

Dialogues.Speaker: Geshu Lin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Then why are you here?

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...I've read your case files in Jinzhou these past few days.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Those Censors failed in their duties and deceived us...

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: How could a single squad captain possibly conspire with Tacet Discords to kill and raid?

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You're just an ordinary man.

Dialogues.Speaker: Geshu Lin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Those things are killing our people. I... won't let that stand.

Dialogues.Speaker: Geshu Lin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Tacet Discords don't get to live. No matter the cost, I won't stop until... they're all annihilated.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Jinzhou's survival depends on stopping the Tacet Discords.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You wield incredible might, but such strength demands restraint.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A sword exists to deter, not kill. Draw too quickly, and you'll die by your own blade.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Your sword can cut down Tacet Discords. Or save lives.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If your resolve to protect this land stands firm, you will forge a legacy.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Qiuyuan once faced a difficult choice. Ordered by the Mingting Censorate to kill Geshu Lin, Qiuyuan hesitated, seeing that the man had not yet fallen to darkness. He saw the raging fire churning in the man's heart, but just as his own teacher once cautioned him, he urged Geshu Lin to wield his power with restraint. In defying the Censorate's command, he spared Geshu Lin's life.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fenrico
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I... I see it now. What haunts you, the memories you carry...

Dialogues.Speaker: Fenrico
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I see that rainy night. That battle. And the Threnodian... feeding on it all.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fenrico
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I see the plain drenched in blood. The man standing atop it all, burning in black flames...

Dialogues.Speaker: Fenrico
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What happened to him?

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: He fell into Ovathrax's abyss.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fenrico
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And shared my fate...

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Maybe when we first met, he still held on to a shred of goodness. But even so, it didn't stop his end from coming.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fenrico
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You should have killed him when you had the chance.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: History grants no second chances. And the dead do not return.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I've lost everything, but it still doesn't cover the debt I owe the dead of that battlefield.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: There's only one thing I can do. Next we meet, I'll end him, quick and clean.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If given the choice again, would you still become Primus?

Dialogues.Speaker: Fenrico
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I would.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fenrico
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Usurper they may deem me, but never shall they deny the fruit of my toil.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fenrico
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well do I know my iniquities, and clear is the end of my path.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fenrico
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So, were I to choose anew, I would tread this path once more… though it spurns the wisdom of every Primus before me, though nothing but trials and terrors lie ahead.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fenrico
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now... take this.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "Thou shalt wield the torch of the usurper to drive away the darkness."

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So this is the "First Relic"?

Dialogues.Speaker: Fenrico
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Napoli the Second wielded it to purge Ragunna of the Dark Tide. And at that moment of triumph, the Order earned the Threnodian's full attention.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fenrico
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This lantern… carry it forth. Should the Journeying Paradise come, it will emerge from Septimont, where the Righteous One shall surely be.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName} has also been tainted by the Dark Tide, like you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fenrico
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Dark Tide binds us all. I did feel {Male=his;Female=her} presence.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fenrico
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {Male=He;Female=She} now stands as the new Harbinger, walking a path that… was never meant to be {Male=his;Female=hers}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fenrico
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That is why {Male=he;Female=she} needs this lantern far more than I do.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Is this your penance?

Dialogues.Speaker: Fenrico
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I do not repent. But a dying Primus has no right to hold onto this relic.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fenrico
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This is... my destiny.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fenrico
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Upon deception had I built my reign and legacy. And no mortal could inflict upon me even the slightest harm.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fenrico
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The wandering Righteous One... is no mere mortal.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fenrico
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Take this lantern!

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The flame of ambition and obsession has died. Only the lantern's glow remains.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So... do you seek vengeance?

Dialogues.Speaker: Fenrico
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: In violence shall I end the pleasure born of violence...

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A Threnodian is no easy kill.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fenrico
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: My flock, the faithful of the Order, and the wandering Righteous One… they shall prevail.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fenrico
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Even though I should fall into hell, Leviathan too shall burn beside me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fenrico
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Become my knight. Take this and go.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fenrico
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: In this way... shall I fulfill my destiny...

Dialogues.Speaker: Fenrico
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...I am Fenrico Macbeth...

Dialogues.Speaker: Fenrico
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Though I may never stand among the greatest Primuses…

Dialogues.Speaker: Fenrico
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: History shall remember me... as Fenrico the First.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: History's truth is inscribed in stone. May those who come after render their verdict on you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So ends the path of <te href=260012>Fenrico the First</te>, of the Order of the Deep.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Your wish is well received.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Through the Dark Tide, Fenrico glimpses these memories. Because Geshu Lin did eventually fall to darkness, guilt has haunted Qiuyuan ever since. But history grants no second chances. All that remains for both Fenrico and Qiuyuan is to fulfill their missions. Choosing to trust Qiuyuan, Fenrico hands the First Relic and the task of defeating Leviathan to him. With that, his soul vanishes into the depths of the Fabricatorium.

Chapters.Title: Talk to your companions and inquire the whereabouts of Qiuyuan

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Good to see you, {PlayerName}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ms. Zani and I have been assessing the damage to Averardo Vault and the Cathedral of Mercury.

Dialogues.Speaker: Zani
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Vault is all right. As Lady Carlotta instructed, we just had to throw a few collections away.

Dialogues.Speaker: Zani
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The losses are nothing compared with the safety of our people.

Options.PlotLineKey: Have you seen Qiuyuan? The one from Huanglong.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I think I saw him by the square.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hard to miss someone from Huanglong in the crowd.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I also noticed quite a few friends from Septimont there discussing the rebuilding. Maybe you could ask if anyone's seen him.

Chapters.Title: Talk to your companions and inquire the whereabouts of Qiuyuan

Dialogues.Speaker: Augusta
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ragunna is indeed nothing like Septimont.

Dialogues.Speaker: Augusta
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A harbor like this suits sea trade far better...

Options.PlotLineKey: Is this your first visit to Ragunna, Augusta?

Dialogues.Speaker: Augusta
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It is. After all, Ragunna was closed to outsiders.

Dialogues.Speaker: Augusta
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But we'll be heading back to Septimont after trade negotiations with the Montellis and the Order are concluded.

Options.PlotLineKey: About that Huanglong warrior who aided in Septimont's frontline defense...
Have you seen the Huanglong warrior?

Dialogues.Speaker: Augusta
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The swordsman named Qiuyuan?

Dialogues.Speaker: Augusta
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I ran into him earlier by the docks. We spoke briefly. He looked ready to board a ship home.

Dialogues.Speaker: Augusta
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Gladiators who stood their ground during the attack spoke of him. They said it was he who held the fiercest frontline alone when the Fractsidus unleashed the Dark Tide.

Dialogues.Speaker: Augusta
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I don't dare imagine the casualties without his aid...

Options.PlotLineKey: I want to thank him in person as well.

Dialogues.Speaker: Augusta
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The ship hasn't set sail yet. So, you should find him at the dock.

Chapters.Title: Find Qiuyuan at the harbor

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sir, how long before the ship departs?

Dialogues.Speaker: Old Merchant
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The captain says once these goods from Septimont are loaded, we prepare to set sail.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I see no Acolytes supervising.

Dialogues.Speaker: Old Merchant
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thought you couldn't see! So you can, eh?

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No... I just sense no one is causing you trouble.

Dialogues.Speaker: Old Merchant
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ragunna and Septimont have been through a lot. Really was those heroes who carried us through this disaster.

Dialogues.Speaker: Old Merchant
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And Lord Fenrico and his predecessors... Under Sentinel Imperator's guidance, they held the lantern high and drove away the darkness surrounding us.

Dialogues.Speaker: Old Merchant
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Still gives me chills when I think about it...

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's all behind us, sir.

Dialogues.Speaker: Old Merchant
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Right you are...

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You board first. I'll be ready soon.

Dialogues.Speaker: Old Merchant
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Aye. Thank you, lad.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You have come.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Leaving so soon?

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I've lingered long enough. My work isn't done.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Scar and the other Fractsidus operatives got away...

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Our Grand Marshal likely expected as much. They always have a way out.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Pity. Would have liked to see if I could sever that goat head in one strike.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I still haven't properly thanked you for your help in Septimont.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Leviathan's influence was aimed at Rinascita. Outsiders like me were spared.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Besides, it was the Grand Marshal who asked me to help you here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You should save your gratitude for her when you visit Mingting someday. She takes great interest in you.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Mingting... I've only been to Jinzhou so far.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The world is wide. Rove far enough, and you'll find your way there.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wait, about Geshu Lin...

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You know Jiyan. You fought in Norfall Barrens. You must also know what really happened in Jinzhou three years ago.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And what becomes of those who fall to the Threnodian. Not everyone has the strength to resist Its persuasions, not like the people here.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Are you still after him?

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Back then, corrupt officials lied to the Internal Security Agency, to Grandmaster Liang, and to me. I went to Jinzhou to execute him.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But at the time... he wasn't what they claimed. It was only later that he fell to the Threnodian's influence.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: For the lives lost in that battle because of him, death is too light a punishment.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But it's what I can give him, and what I must.

Dialogues.Speaker: Old Merchant
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Come now, lad! Ye' miss this ship to Mengzhou, and you're waiting till morning!

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: They call you Rover, but you're not without a home. You are a blade with a sheath.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Those who stand by you are your home. Your sheath. They will fight for you. And you, for them.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Maybe one day...

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You will.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You are what they say.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: May our paths cross again.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: In the end, you find Qiuyuan just before he boards a merchant ship bound for Mengzhou. He tells you he came to Rinascita to aid you at someone's request, and Scar was merely a side matter. The two of you are but strangers whose paths happened to cross. But the world is wide, the road is long. Perhaps one day, in Huanglong, your paths will cross again.
